content: one of the projects i've been hacking on the past few days is trying to get rust + wasm-bindgen working with async javascript code. it's been a bit of a challenge. i'm tempted to write a status quo on it; i don't think we currently have anything that talks about async with wasm-bindgen thrown in the to mix
Yea I agree. It would be really cool to see a status quo for that topic.
@Andrew Chin (eminence) please do so
I've been thinking about writing some Wasm shiny future stories; it's a good point that we need status quo stories to match

Andrew Chin (eminence) said:

one of the projects i've been hacking on the past few days is trying to get rust + wasm-bindgen working with async javascript code. it's been a bit of a challenge. i'm tempted to write a status quo on it; i don't think we currently have anything that talks about async with wasm-bindgen thrown in the to mix

wasm-bindgen-futures helps a lot. I certainly have tried and successfully spawned async Rust tasks, but haven't tried transferring it from js. And this would be a very nice story.
